text: "Cherry Bomb" is a 1987 song by John Mellencamp and taken from his ninth studio album The Lonesome Jubilee. It went to number 4 in New Zealand, number 5 in Canada, number 8 in the United States and number 20 in Australia. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:John Mellencamp songs
title: Cherry Bomb (John Mellencamp song)
